title: Hasan
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In Thaluang Vilage near the crossing Road 13, this is an Indian food restaurant that opened in 2012. Menu includes around 20 vegetarian choices, a few of which are vegan - ask. Has Wi-Fi. Owner has many years experience in cooking for Indian restaurants in Laos, Malaysia, and Thailand. Lao food is also on offer but maybe not veg ones.
